name: Logic Media Zone
overview:
Logic Media is a Louisville, Kentucky based web design firm specializing in website design, search engine optimization and online marketing. Our firm provides custom and competitive website development services to a wide range of clients, enabling them to grow their business and build brand equity.

We strongly believe that having a professional and effective website that generates leads should not be a complicated or expensive process. Our marketing solutions such as professional website design, SEO/SEM, graphic design, blog interfaces, photography and online video help our clients reach their target audience and generate results.
